name: Cute Baby Panda Run: Secret Kung Fu Passages
name_original: Cute Baby Panda Run: Secret Kung Fu Passages
description:
Shaolin Panda & Ninja Panda are well trained kung fu master in the animals world.
To earn their master recognization, they both must go the wild forest to practice their kung fu skills.

Help them overcome the obstacles.
Features:
- Endless running scenes
- Tap the left to jump, Tap on the right to shoot
- Cool and entertaining music
- Perfect game for kids

Download this game now!
